Headline: #95 95th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Exchange/South Chicago
ShortDescription: Westbound 95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Colfax & 93rd, due to street blockage near Exchange/South Chicago.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #95 95th buses are temporarily rerouted via 92nd, Colfax, then resume their normal route on 93rd, due to street blockage near Exchange/South Chicago.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Sheridan
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark & Lunt, due to street blockage near Lunt/Sheridan.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Sheridan, Touhy, Clark, then resume their normal route on Lunt, due to street blockage near Lunt/Sheridan.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #72 North Temporary Eastbound Reroute near North Avenue Beach
ShortDescription: Eastbound 72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound 72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #72 North buses are unable to service North Avenue Beach. Customers may board Eastbound #72 North buses at North Avenue and Clark. 

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
